    • Method Detail

      • setPort

        public ConnectionSpec.Builder setPort(java.lang.Long port)
        Port number. This property was added in vSphere API 6.7.1. If null, port 443 will be used.
        Parameters:
        port - New value for the property.

      • setSslThumbprint

        public ConnectionSpec.Builder setSslThumbprint(java.lang.String sslThumbprint)
        SHA1 hash of the server SSL certificate. This property was added in vSphere API 6.7.1. If null, empty ssl thumbprint is assumed.
        Parameters:
        sslThumbprint - New value for the property.

      • setUsername

        public ConnectionSpec.Builder setUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Username to access the server. This property was added in vSphere API 6.7.1. This property is currently required. If null, an error is returned. In the future, if this property is null, the system will attempt to identify the user. If a user cannot be identified, then the requested operation will fail.
        Parameters:
        username - New value for the property.

      • setPassword

        public ConnectionSpec.Builder setPassword(char[] password)
        Password for the specified user. This property was added in vSphere API 6.7.1. This property is currently required. If null, an empty password is assumed. In the future, if this property is null, the system will attempt to authenticate the user. If a user cannot be identified, then the requested operation will fail.
        Parameters:
        password - New value for the property.

      • build

        public ConnectionSpec build()
